name: Merge Push
description:
Merge Push is a HTML5 merge puzzle game. This Game is very easy and addictive to play.
Kids with elementary education level can play the game easily. The game is only about numbers. You should put similar numbers together to merge and make a greater number.

You can share your ideas with us via email: doondookstudio@gmail.com

All the assets of Merge Push are designed with DoonDookStudio including graphic design and music.

Visit Here for more information about the game

Our Game Store: https://doondook.studio/buy-html5-games
